H0.text: In music, who was Sweet and Innocent and Too Young. David Cassidy

H1.text: In music, who was Sweet and Innocent and Too Young. Bobby Vinton

H2.text: In music, who was Sweet and Innocent and Too Young. Frankie Avalon

H3.text: In music, who was Sweet and Innocent and Too Young. Donny Osmond

A4.text: He was a former teen idol.

A5.text: He had 31 charting U.S. Billboard singles from 1958 to late 1962, including number one hits, 'Venus' in 1959 and 'Why' in 1960.
